quote: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.  – Oprah Winfrey
fact: Walt Disney holds the world record for the most Academy Awards won by one person, he has won twenty statuettes, and twelve other plaques and certificates
joke: A cannibal is someone who is fed up with people.
